name: Flappy Waves
description:
Flappy Waves

You can play your favorite songs pressing "L" in the main menu or while playing. Some audio files may not be suitable for an enganging level, so don't be afraid to try different songs!

A short, experimental game made following the theme of the Global Game Jam 2017, "Waves".

---

Sample Music:

Bensound.com - Pop Dance

Purple-Planet.com - El Toro

Edvard Grieg - Hall of the Mountain King
